Uses of Class
com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers.TransformerContainer

  • Packages that use TransformerContainer 
    Package Description
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter
    Contains classes which are responsible for eventually converting the number into mapping word combinations.
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary
    Contains classes which are primarily responsible for the creation and population of the dictionary.
    com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers
    Contains tranformer contract and other generic transformers which are used to tranform raw numbers and words into words used by dictionary and number converters.

    • Uses of TransformerContainer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter

      Methods in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter with parameters of type TransformerContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NumberConverterAlgorithm.transform(TransformerContainer<Set<String>> numberContainer)
      Applies any pre-massaging to be done on the number string, and then searches for all the matching combinations.
      Method parameters in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.converter with type arguments of type TransformerContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NumbersConverter.convertNumbers(List<Stream<String>> numberStreams, Consumer<TransformerContainer<Set<String>>> consumer) 

    • Uses of TransformerContainer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary

      Methods in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary with parameters of type TransformerContainer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WordToNumberConverter.transform(TransformerContainer<String> wordToNumTransformerContainer)
      Transforms a given word,after applying transformation from a parent transformer, to a number based on the number encoding.
      Furthermore, if there is a parent transformer applied, then the word generated by it is set as the input to argument numberTransformerContainer.
      Since that is the word which would be stored in the dictionary.

    • Uses of TransformerContainer in com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers

      Transforms or returns the errors based on the regular expressions provided

      Method whose implementation would transform and validate(if required) a given input
